data.title: Arthur Lake Jr.
data.meta_description: Arthur Lake Jr.. Self: Meet the Family. Arthur Lake Jr. was born on 1 March 1943 in Hollywood, California, USA. He was an actor, known for Meet the Family (1954). He died on 6 April 1994 in Blythe, Riverside County, California, USA.
data.text: At the time of his death Lake was hoping to develop a television mini-series, "The Hidden Hearst," based on his claim that his mother Patricia Lake, who ostensibly was Marion Davies's niece, was actually the love-child of Davies and William Randolph Hearst. The title was suggested by Ann Sothern, the mother of Lake's long-time girlfriend Tisha Sterling.
